backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that integrates access control and blob storage mixins, manages supporter requests/approvals with time-based validity, and handles user profiles with display names, bios, avatars, links, and plushie images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the addition of a Figma site navigation link in the Nav component with high confidence, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and content, detailing routing, authentication, gallery, community board, events, articles, and admin functionality with backend integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Plushie Haven application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router setup, theme provider, age gate, session timeout warning, and routes for home, articles, events, profiles, admin pages, and role-guarded admin routes.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age verification component that checks localStorage for 18+ confirmation, displays a modal dialog on first visit, and blocks access if the user declines.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access denied screen showing error message based on authentication status and role, with navigation options to sign in or return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGuard.t: Role-based route guard that checks user permissions against required role using hierarchy (guest < user < admin) and shows AccessDeniedScreen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication controls dropdown displaying user identity, role badge, profile navigation, admin claim functionality with actor connection checks, and logout with cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header containing logo, navigation, and auth controls, plus a footer with copyright and links. Uses Outlet for nested routing.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Reusable loading indicator component displaying a spinning Loader2 icon with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Navigation component with desktop and mobile (Sheet) views, including main nav links, external links (Reflect & Create, Design Inspiration), and admin dropdown menu for admin users.
frontend/src/components/profiles/AvatarU: Avatar upload component with file validation (type, size), preview functionality, and conversion to ExternalBlob format. Supports PNG, JPEG, and WebP images.
frontend/src/components/profiles/EditPro: Profile editing form with fields for display name, bio, avatar, links, plushie images, and public directory toggle. Handles both profile creation and updates with validation.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Plushie: A React component for editing plushie images with upload, preview, and removal functionality. Manages image validation, file-to-blob conversion, and preview URL lifecycle with cleanup.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: A simple React component that displays a grid of plushie images from ExternalBlob objects. Returns null if no images are provided.
A React component that renders a list of external links with icons and safe URL handling. Returns null if no links are provided.
frontend/src/components/SessionTimeoutWa: Alert dialog that warns users before session timeout and provides a button to extend the session, displaying remaining time in MM:SS format.
frontend/src/components/supporter/Suppor: A React component that displays a gradient badge with a heart icon to indicate supporter status.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines article data structure and exports an array of educational articles about plushie care, display, and collecting. Contains full article content for each topic.
frontend/src/content/events.ts: An empty file, likely a placeholder for future event content definitions.
frontend/src/content/teddyStorybook.ts: Exports a storybook content object containing a children's story about Teddy the bear's forest adventure. Includes title, description, cover image path, and full story text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that manages backend actor creation with authentication, handling both anonymous and authenticated states. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistantChat.ts: A React hook for managing chat state with a plushie assistant, including message history, session state, and localStorage persistence. Provides quick action shortcuts and message processing.
frontend/src/hooks/useEventQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for event operations (list and create) with placeholder implementations. Currently returns empty arrays as the backend doesn't support events yet.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryFavorites.t: An empty file, likely a placeholder for future gallery favorites functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryMediaQuerie: An empty file, likely a placeholder for future gallery media query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation. Provides context for authentication status and operations throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profile operations including listing directory profiles, fetching user profiles, following/unfollowing users, and managing follow counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTimeout.ts: Hook that manages automatic session timeout with configurable inactivity period (default 30 minutes), shows warnings before logout, and tracks user activity across multiple event types.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: React Query hook that checks if a static asset is available at a given URL using HEAD/GET fallback strategy with 5-minute caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupporterQueries.t: React Query hooks for supporter management including fetching supporters, checking supporter status, submitting/approving supporter requests, and revoking supporter access with admin-only operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Hooks for fetching and checking user roles (guest, user, admin) with permission hierarchy validation and convenience helpers for admin/moderator checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette featuring baby blue and pastel pink theme for a cozy plushie aesthetic, with identical light and dark mode styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing Plushie Haven's mission, community values, offerings, and guidelines for adult plushie enthusiasts with card-based layout.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUserManagementPa: Admin page for user management with search interface and role assignment UI, currently showing placeholder content with alert indicating backend implementation is required.
frontend/src/pages/AdultPacifierBrandsPa: Displays a grid of adult pacifier brands with descriptions, specialties, and badges. Includes a static list of 10 brands with details about their unique features and target markets.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsDashboardPag: Shows analytics dashboard with metrics for events, supporters, and pending requests. Fetches data from multiple hooks and displays metric cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays individual article content based on slug parameter. Shows article title, category badge, read time, summary, and full content with back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in a grid layout with cards showing category, read time, title, and summary. Each card links to the detailed article page.
frontend/src/pages/AuditLogPage.tsx: Placeholder page for audit logs with search functionality. Displays alert indicating backend implementation is required for this feature to work.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with email composition and copy-to-clipboard functionality. Allows users to send messages via mailto link or copy the contact email address.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Events management page with create event form and event listing. Handles authentication, date/time validation, backend error handling, and displays events with formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page for Plushie Haven featuring a hero section with logo and tagline, a "Plushie Moments" section, and links to explore articles. Includes error handling for hero image loading with fallback display.
Chat interface for the "Plushie Pal Assistant" AI companion with message history, quick action buttons, send/clear functionality, and auto-scrolling. Uses useAssistantChat hook for state management.
frontend/src/pages/PlushieBrandsPage.tsx: Static informational page displaying a grid of 13 popular plushie brands (Squishmallows, Jellycat, Steiff, etc.) with descriptions and specialty badges. Includes an explanatory section about the curated list.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page supporting viewing own/other profiles, editing mode via query param, follow/unfollow functionality, and profile creation prompts. Handles authentication state and displays profile data including links and images.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Directory listing page showing all public community profiles in a grid layout. Includes empty states for no profiles and error handling, with create profile prompts for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: React page component for supporter management, allowing users to submit supporter requests and admins to approve/revoke supporters, with external links to Ko-fi and Patreon.
frontend/src/pages/SystemSettingsPage.ts: Placeholder admin page for system-wide settings (features, content limits, moderation, session) with a notice that backend implementation is required.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes backend actor errors into user-friendly messages, handling stopped canisters, authorization errors, moderation blocks, and admin claim conflicts.
frontend/src/utils/galleryMedia.ts: Empty utility file for gallery media handling (no content).
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Validates image file types (PNG, JPEG, WebP) and size (max 2MB) for profile images and plushie uploads.
frontend/src/utils/inputValidation.ts: Provides validation functions for text length, usernames, URLs, file uploads, and detects dangerous HTML/script content.
frontend/src/utils/linkifyText.ts: Empty utility file for text linkification (no content).
frontend/src/utils/plushieAssistant.ts: Implements a conversational assistant for plushie recommendations and stories, with intent detection, multi-step recommendation flow, care tips, and fun facts.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Converts File objects to Uint8Array and ExternalBlob for profile image uploads, and manages preview URLs for local files.
frontend/src/utils/sanitization.ts: Provides text sanitization utilities including HTML stripping/escaping, URL protocol validation, whitespace normalization, and safe text display with optional length limits.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Exports a function to verify static asset availability by attempting HEAD request first, then falling back to aborted GET request if HEAD is unsupported or fails.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, font families (Quicksand, Nunito, Inter), custom shadows, border radius variables, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file for "Plushie Haven" tracking one existing feature (navigation link to Figma site) and one pending feature request with the same goal.
